Text:
you've uploaded the same film 9 times now. all in the same size, all using the same source that is missing scenes.

what's your problem :P

tannerman

whats your problem. THIS IS THE ONLY VERSION OUT ANYWHERE ON THE NET AT THIS MOMENT UNTIL SOMEONE RELEASES ANOTHER VERSION LATER IN TIME! Why don't you understand that.  Its free. Stop complaining. If you don't like it don't watch it. ITS FREE YOU FUCKING IDIOT! GO THA FUCK AWAY!
stfu. this uploader dosnt realize he's been uploading the very same file 9 times. that is what's bugging me

yeah tanneman I miss the days when 1 person would up a file, and people would actually respect their torrent and not just swipe it and re-up it over and over under their name, now we have 45 idiots upping the same horrible piece of shit with no descriptions or explanation

Yeah guys, i feel ya! I miss the days when people actually appreciated things. You little bastards kill me.  Only a bunch of douche bags would come and complain about something free! If you fucking dicks are so much better, why aren't you uploading new theater releases in HD!  You couldn't do any better. Its free, and bootlegs are not gonna be dvd quality 99 % of the time. you act like it should be in full 1080p.  You are either so ignorant, that you can't wipe your own ass without your moms helping you, or your just plain stupid! I vote for both! If you don't like it go to another site and see how much better it is! Its not, so go away! Ungrateful little tit sucking leeches!

rcr29budcar@ just GO AWAY!
don't feed this TROLL.

based on his bad writing, he's obviosly 12, he gets mad over ppl that are honest and telling ppl the truth, and he wasn't taught how to use paragraphs and spaces. JUST LEAVE THIS SITE

from the looks of things there r allot of other people feeling the same as me. I've seen comments on the other torrents, and u need to see reality....that we know how things work, your little warnings r not needed! And your the one not wanted here!  These uploaders r great!    this is just how bootlegs are. and attacking my paragraphs and shit is childish, have u also not noticed that in this day and age that no one uses proper paragraphs and shit like that when typing on sites such as this! And trolls always say things like "you must be 9 yrs old"  and similar things. U r the one who should go away. EITHER DOWNLOAD THE MOVIE OR GO AWAY! STOP BASHING BONE, SCENE, SAF, AND ALL THE OTHERS! IF U DO NOT LIKE IT, U DO NOT HAVE TO DOWNLOAD IT! Just put a comment that you don't like it and go on, don't put a stupid warining on every damn page on the net, BECAUSE WE KNOW! You r not helping. Its not about truth, its about you flaming the uploaders and annoying everyone else!

sometimes i wish people would just stick to commenting on

and quit with this juvenile jazz.

the fact that you went mad on someone that was trying to help is absurb. ive had ppl thanking me for warning them, you should have done the same.
